IndicatorShortName: Change in Annual Tourism Arrivals by Air
Definition: Total Visitors as published refers to visitors arrival by air
Calculation/Formulation: Total Visitors minus total visitors previous year
SourceTag: Table 7.1 : Summary of International Migration Arrival Statistics , QSI
indicator_name: ECO 3.2.2.Annual change in tourism by air and sea arrivals
graph_title: ECO 3.2.2.Annual change in tourism by air and sea arrivals
